name: Sadness Incorporated
description:
Hello, this is my project inspired by the original Madness Interactive Flash Game.

This is a work in progress and i will be updating it as often as i can. 

I'm working on this alone so i apologize for the slow rate of progress.

Game is free to play, might cost a few cents if i ever get it finished :P

Game is packaged so use 7zip or Winrar to open it.

Currently playable, not much content yet though.

If you'd like to give some feedback, please do it here (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdqARhvhCI_kHL-7lJt0im8JxQJBNahtqtGVJTz...)
